snippet: On Wednesday, the Colts parted ways with Peyton Manning, their iconic quarterback who turned the franchise from laughingstock to constant contender.
abstract: Indianapolis Colts announce that they will release Peyton Manning, their iconic quarterback who turned the franchise from laughingstock to constant contender; Manning's 14 years with the Colts included a Super Bowl title in the 2006 season; Manning had hoped to play for one team his entire career, but with this development he is poised to become perhaps the most coveted free agent in NFL history.
lead_paragraph: On Wednesday, the Colts parted ways with Peyton Manning, their iconic quarterback who turned the franchise from laughingstock to constant contender.

headline.seo: Peyton Manning and the Colts Part Ways
headline.main: Manning Reaches End of the Line With the Colts
headline.print_headline: Manning and Colts to Part Ways
